item.title: The Stockholm Experience
item.description: Ever since I started on my MBA Journey with the HBX CORe, followed by HBX Disruptive StrategyÂ with no other than Prof Christiansen himself, I have cycled through many iterations of the “Jobs to be done” approach, the “IDEO Human centered design process” and finally the “Designing for Growth: A Design Thinking Tool Kit”. This brings out a very innovative design process which I believe I have practiced over and over again during my entire MBA experience at Babson.
